General.Name: San Miguel AG
General.Description: S.A. San Miguel A.G.I.C.I. y F. engages in cultivation, processing, producing, and commercializing citrus products in Argentina. The company is involved in harvesting, packing, and grinding activities. It also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1955 and is based in FamaillÃ, Argentina.
